channel.title: Does anyone know of a server that runs on a mac?
channel.description:
I've been searching for a while now to find a server that runs on a mac, and I just can't seem to find one. I've tried all of the sponsored servers and many others. They just give me an error telling to me clear my cache, close my browser and other generic fixes, none of which worked. I've tried on both my laptop and my desktop.
Before you tell me about it, Yes i do know about VM ware fusion and crossover, I currently use VM ware fusion.
That is not what I'm asking.
My question is simply does anyone know of a server that will run on a mac without the use of some sort of converter?

item.title: Does anyone know of a server that runs on a mac?
item.dc:creator: @aerodude30 aerodude30
item.description:
@aerodude30 wrote:

well there is deltascape all u have to do is go to there website download the client open up your termin type ‘cd’ then a space drag the whole folder into the terminal should be client 3.9 (thats the server) then you have to type this thing in to activate it idk its like Xxmjava3.5X or smthing like that its probly not right but you can get it from deltascape website, or you could play my server Im pretty sure it works on a mac its 562 which means it looks like runescape does now whearas deltascape is 317 which means old runescape

Read full topic
item.source: Does anyone know of a server that runs on a mac?
